definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: Several years of experience as an assembler or inspector in the same company are usually required.
sentences.chinese: 通常需要多年在同一家公司作爲裝配工或督察的經驗。

sentences.english: In other words, OFHEO wasn't just regulating Fannie Mae, it was out to get Fannie Mae.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，督察局不僅要規範房利美，還要摧毀它。

sentences.english: Assistant Police Inspector Wayne Bvudzijena said he did not know of the incident.
sentences.chinese: 助理警務督察巴韋烏德日揚說，他不知道這一事件。

sentences.english: He checked the slaves' work, ignoring poor Hency's existence.
sentences.chinese: 他督察奴隸們幹活，忽視了漢西的存在。

sentences.english: A traffic warden sees that all cars are properly parked.
sentences.chinese: 交通督察官檢查所有車輛是否遵守規則停放。

sentences.english: It is true that the SEC would never have done some of the things OFHEO did.
sentences.chinese: 的確，督察局乾的一些事，證交會絕不會幹。
在加拿大適用的職業“督察”。

sentences.english: Several years of experience as an assembler, inspector or lead hand are required.
sentences.chinese: 必需具備幾年的裝配工，督察或領導助手經驗。

sentences.english: This same source said that "OFHEO was trying to embarrass Fannie Mae ."
sentences.chinese: 同一來源還說，“督察局打算找房利美的麻煩。”

sentences.english: The same method used for bottle pressing is used for CIP sanitizing .
sentences.chinese: 同樣的方法用於瓶緊迫用於督察消毒。

sentences.english: The inspector informed us that he was to protract his stay for some days.
sentences.chinese: 督察通知我們他將在此多呆幾天。

sentences.english: Despite these problems, some inspectors vow to keep on fighting.
sentences.chinese: 儘管困難重重，一些督察仍然堅持戰鬥着。

sentences.english: And it was the White House that got OFHEO the funds to hire Deloitte & Touche to investigate Fannie.
sentences.chinese: 正是白宮向督察局提供了聘請德勤調查房利美的資金。

sentences.english: The Burmese sub-inspector and some Indian constables were waiting for me in the quarter where the elephant had been seen.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸督察和幾名印度警察在發現那頭象的地方等我。

sentences.english: But OFHEO supporters say the agency had to play hardball.
sentences.chinese: 但支持督察局的人說，督察局必須不擇手段。

definition: to hold accountable/to blame/to censure/to apportion blame
open enquiries and secret search (idiom); to investigate openly and in secret/taking information from all sides
open enquiries and secret search (idiom); to investigate openly and in secret/taking information from all sides
to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
environment protection office/PRC National bureau of environmental protection
Central Commission for Discipline Inspection (CCDI), organization within the CCP which investigates corruption and other wrongdoing among Party cadres/abbr. for 中共中央紀律檢查委員會|中共中央纪律检查委员会
